prompts.name: system
prompts.prompt_template: You are a helpful AI Assistant that extracts contextual information for each chunk from the whole document.

prompts.name: prompt_chunk
prompts.prompt_template:
Here is the chunk we want to situate within the whole document:
<chunk>
{CHUNK_CONTENT}
</chunk>
Please give a succinct meaningful context to situate this chunk within the overall document for the purposes of improving search retrieval of the chunk. Answer only with the succinct context and nothing else.
